channel.title: Dupeing on delta code
channel.description:
heres my code that i put in the client.java [code]if(TradeConfirmed = true && TradeConfirmed = false);{ sM("" +playerName+ " Is Dupeing"); return; }[/code]
And i get this error when compiling [code]client.java:20638: unexpected type required: variable found : value if(TradeConfirmed = true && TradeConfirmed = false);{ ^ Note: EconomyReset.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error[/code]
and ideas? or tell me how to actually prevnt this dupe its the basic one were if ur on the sencond trade screen the other player accepts and u hit accept and decline FAST
Thanks,
-Lemons burn

item.title: Dupeing on delta code
item.dc:creator: @lemons_burn lemons burn
item.description:
@lemons_burn wrote:

heres my code that i put in the client.java

if(TradeConfirmed = true && TradeConfirmed = false);{ sM("" +playerName+ " Is Dupeing"); return; }

And i get this error when compiling

client.java:20638: unexpected type required: variable found : value if(TradeConfirmed = true && TradeConfirmed = false);{ ^ Note: EconomyReset.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error

and ideas? or tell me how to actually prevnt this dupe its the basic one were if ur on the sencond trade screen the other player accepts and u hit accept and decline FAST

Thanks,
